name: Jakub Zalewski
body:
### About me

Within a decade in web development I have built solutions for various needs - content management, publishing, mmog, advertising campaigns, image processing, social networking, among many. I have worked with corporate clients, ad agencies, as well as private entities and startups. Currently I'm a consultant at bigcorp full-time, and for hire by the hour. 

### Dev

* Python
  * Django
  * Flask
  * SQLAlchemy
* DB
  * PostgreSQL
    * PostGIS
  * MySQL
  * MongoDB
  * full-text
    * ElasticSearch
    * Whoosh
* JavaScript
  * Jquery
  * Grunt
  * Angular
  * Node
  * CoffeeScript
* UI
  * HTML5 / CSS3
  * Sass, Compass
  * Zurb Foundation
  * Bootstrap
  * Responsive design, mobile first, progressive enhancement
* SCM
  * Git
  * Mercurial

### Ops / Deploy

* Linux
  * Ubuntu
  * Debian
* Ansible
* Nginx
* Vagrant
* Jira
* Jenkins

### IDE

* SublimeText
* Eclipse
* Vim

### Other

* TDD
* CI
* Agile

## Contact

Whether you want to ask questions about my projects, work with me, or just say 'hi' - feel free to contact me at any time: [zalew7@gmail.com] (zalew7@gmail.com)
